name: Duchess Community Hall
description: A central hub for local events, meetings, and celebrations. The Community Hall is the heart of Duchess gatherings.

name: Duchess Golf Course
description: A scenic 9-hole golf course offering fun for all ages and skill levels, with beautiful prairie views.

name: Duchess Agricultural Grounds
description: Home to rodeos, fairs, and agricultural exhibitions, showcasing the region's farming heritage.

name: Duchess School
description: A K-12 school known for its strong academics, sports, and community involvement.

name: Duchess Arena
description: A modern ice arena hosting hockey, skating, and community events year-round.

name: Prairie Oasis Park
description: A beautiful park with playgrounds, picnic areas, and walking trails for families and visitors.

name: Duchess Museum
description: Explore the history of Duchess and area with exhibits, artifacts, and local stories.

name: Local Businesses & Shops
description: A variety of local businesses, shops, and services that support the community and visitors.
